data.text: Great location, few steps from the metro. The room was nice and clean, very spacious. the staff at the reception was friendly and kind. I didnt like the breakfast, the  restaurat was very crowded and noisy,  the table not clean and there were not  a choise of sweet.
data.title: Good hotel!!  Don't take the breakfast

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,

Thank you very much for taking your time to write your feedback in regard to your stay at Mercure Dubai.

We are very happy to know that you were able to experience the hospitality and exceptional service of our hosts, our comfortable rooms and appreciated our convenient location as we love seeing our guests take advantage of our proximity to so many excellent places in Dubai.
However, I do apologize for not meeting your expectations in regards to the breakfast and I will make sure to share your comment further with the concerned departments.

Once again, thank you for your feedback and I hope this experience will not deter you from coming back to our property. 

Sincerely,
Mohamed Elatik
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Elatik

data.text:
Highly disappointed with our stay! 

We were on a family vacation for my son's birthday. Got it booked through an agent still our experience at the hotel wasn't something that was expected. We had booked their suite, the room looked fancy but there were many glitches in our experience. 

Room:
Upon reaching the hotel, my son was hungry and wanted to have fruits. So I called the in room dining and asked for a plate and knife. After which I learnt that we have to pay 20 AED if we wanted cutlery. After repeated requests they only sent a knife. This is the first hotel that we have travelled where we need to pay for the cutlery. So if you want to stay here please carry cutlery along. 

Washroom:
The service in the suite was very substandard. The toiletries were given upon asking and wasn't placed from before. The bathtub needed to be fixed, as the water wasn't getting drained out. 

Breakfast: 
The biggest disappointment was breakfast. As there were limited options and everyday a fixed standard menu was there. Not a single alteration in the menu was there. The staff at the breakfast counters always looked really grumpy. 

For my son's birthday celebration we requested for a cake and decoration. We were just provided a cake and a few balloons. There was no candle provided. 

Overall experience was not worth it! Wouldn't visit again.
data.title: Highly disappointed with our stay!

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Ms. Akshatas,

Thank you very much for choosing Mercure Dubai and for sharing your feedback with us.

I would like to start by apologizing to you for not meeting your expectations with reference to the challenges you have faced during your stay with us. 
We strive to make each stay as pleasant and memorable as possible, and I sincerely regret we fell short of our goal. 
Thank you for bringing these experiences to our attention and please be assured that we value all our guests' feedback to be of utmost importance and will ensure that necessary corrective measures are taken accordingly to avoid any similar situations in the future.
Also, kindly be informed that for the suites section we do provide the cutlery supplied by the room service so additional charges will apply as well as for any decoration set ups for the celebration or event.

I hope you will give us a chance by staying with us again to show you that your disappointment with your first stay with us was an exception. 
I would greatly appreciate you allow me the opportunity to reach out to you to further discuss it through our email address.

Again, we are genuinely sorry for your experience and thank you for sharing your comments.

Sincerely,
Mohamed Elatik
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Elatik

data.text: Our stay was so good. Hotel has perfect breakfast and awesome view to night city. Room very comfortable for 2 adults and one toddler. I would like to express special gratitude to Vignesh and Suraj. They were very pleasure and were very fast. I want to back here my next time in Dubai.
data.title: Good place for stay with family

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valued Guest,     

Thank you very much for your feedback following your recent stay at Mercure Dubai.

We are pleased to know that you had a wonderful stay with us and were happy with our facilities and services. 
It gives us great pride and joy that our guests leave the hotel with nothing but praises.
It was a pleasure to have you as our guest and we very much look forward to welcoming you again soon.

Sincerely,
Mohamed Elatik
Rooms Division Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Elatik

data.text: The ac was not working and they didn’t replace the room and. I was waiting until fixing the Ac but as a hotel is ok and so many people in the front disk and they are busy always not have a chance for helping you I stay for a. 2 nights 3 days but it’s ok but I didn’t did it again honestly
data.title: Ok

data.text: The holiday was very good, I really liked everything, the food was very tasty, the pools were clean and the water was warm, I also liked the service, everyone respects you and loves you very much. Hemraj house keeping supervaiser always took care of how our vacation would be and made our vacation the best!
data.title: Nice Holiday
